div.style: display: inline-block; background-color: #d9e0e7; padding: 6px; margin: 4px; border: 1px solid #8da1b4; border-radius: 5px; line-height: 60%
div.p: Profiles: CRMI Shareable CodeSystem, CRMI Publishable CodeSystem
This case-sensitive code system https://hispethiopia.org/enable/CodeSystem/HIVStatusProfileCS defines the following codes:

tr.td: C: Client was counseled but declined HIV testing
T: Client counseled and tested, but didnt receive results
TR: Client counseled tested and results given HIV Neg
TRR: Counseled, tested and results given; HIV Pos
TRK: Clients with a documented HIV -ve conducted within 4 wks prior to 1st ANC visit
TRRK: Clients with a documented HIV +ve test result prior to 1st ANC visit

display.value: C: Client was counseled but declined HIV testing
T: Client counseled and tested, but didnt receive results
TR: Client counseled tested and results given HIV Neg
TRR: Counseled, tested and results given; HIV Pos
TRK: Clients with a documented HIV -ve conducted within 4 wks prior to 1st ANC visit
TRRK: Clients with a documented HIV +ve test result prior to 1st ANC visit
